item.title: Async Operations with AbortController & AbortSignal in Nodejs
item.description: AbortController is the standard way to abort any ongoing operations. AbortController and AbortSignal are now part of Nodejs LTS (originally introduced in v15.0.0). Modern apps usually donâ€™t work in isolation. They interact with entities like other APIs, file system, network, databases, etc.
